effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.

short_effect.black_white: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

flavor_text.black_white: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
